Table of Contents

Class TransformSequence<T>

Namespace
osu.Framework.Graphics.Transforms
Assembly
osu.Framework.dll

A sequence of Transforms all operating upon the same ITransformable of type T. Exposes various operations to extend the sequence by additional osu.Framework.Graphics.Transforms such as delays, loops, continuations, and events.

public class TransformSequence<T> : ITransformSequence where T : class, ITransformable

Type Parameters

T

The type of the ITransformable the Transforms in this sequence operate upon.

origin T

The T to attach the new TransformSequence<T> to.

Methods

Append(Action<T>)

Invokes originAction inside a BeginAbsoluteSequence(double, bool) such that TransformStartTime is the current time of this TransformSequence<T>. It is the responsibility of originAction to make appropriate use of TransformStartTime.

public TransformSequence<T> Append(Action<T> originAction)

Parameters

originAction Action<T>

The function to be invoked.

Appends multiple TransformSequence<T>.Generators to this TransformSequence<T>.

public TransformSequence<T> Append(IEnumerable<TransformSequence<T>.Generator> childGenerators)

Parameters

childGenerators IEnumerable<TransformSequence<T>.Generator>

The TransformSequence<T>.Generators to be appended.

Returns

TransformSequence<T>

This TransformSequence<T>.

Append(Generator)

Appends a TransformSequence<T>.Generators to this TransformSequence<T>. The TransformSequence<T>.Generator is invoked within a BeginAbsoluteSequence(double, bool) such that the generated TransformSequence<T> starts at the correct point in time. Its Transforms are then merged into this TransformSequence<T>.

public TransformSequence<T> Append(TransformSequence<T>.Generator childGenerator)

Parameters

childGenerator TransformSequence<T>.Generator

The TransformSequence<T>.Generator to be appended.

Returns

TransformSequence<T>

This TransformSequence<T>.

Append<TResult>(Func<T, TResult>, out TResult)

Invokes originFunc inside a BeginAbsoluteSequence(double, bool) such that TransformStartTime is the current time of this TransformSequence<T>. It is the responsibility of originFunc to make appropriate use of TransformStartTime.

public TransformSequence<T> Append<TResult>(Func<T, TResult> originFunc, out TResult result)

Parameters

originFunc Func<T, TResult>

The function to be invoked.

result TResult

The resulting value of the invocation of originFunc.

Returns

TransformSequence<T>

This TransformSequence<T>.

Type Parameters

TResult

The return type of originFunc.

Delay(double, params Generator[])

Advances the start time of future appended TransformSequence<T>s by delay milliseconds. Then, childGenerators are appended via Append(IEnumerable<Generator>).

public TransformSequence<T> Delay(double delay, params TransformSequence<T>.Generator[] childGenerators)

Parameters

delay double

The delay to advance the start time by.

childGenerators Generator[]

The optional TransformSequence<T>.Generators for TransformSequence<T>s to be appended.

Returns

TransformSequence<T>

This TransformSequence<T>.

Finally(Action<T>)

Registers a callback function which is triggered once any Transform in this TransformSequence<T> is aborted or when all Transforms complete successfully. This is equivalent with calling both OnComplete(Action<T>) and OnAbort(Action<T>). Only a single callback function may be registered.

public void Finally(Action<T> function)

Parameters

function Action<T>

The callback function.

Loop(double)

Repeats all Transforms within this TransformSequence<T> indefinitely.

public TransformSequence<T> Loop(double pause = 0)

Parameters

pause double

The pause between iterations in milliseconds.

Returns

TransformSequence<T>

This TransformSequence<T>.

Repeats all Transforms within this TransformSequence<T>numIters times with pause milliseconds between iterations.

public TransformSequence<T> Loop(double pause, int numIters)

The pause between iterations in milliseconds.

numIters int

The number of iterations.

TransformSequence<T>

This TransformSequence<T>.

Loop(double, int, params Generator[])

Append a looping TransformSequence<T> to this TransformSequence<T>. All Transforms generated by childGenerators are appended to this TransformSequence<T> and then repeated numIters times with pause milliseconds between iterations.

public TransformSequence<T> Loop(double pause, int numIters, params TransformSequence<T>.Generator[] childGenerators)

OnAbort(Action<T>)

Registers a callback function which is triggered once any Transform in this TransformSequence<T> is aborted (e.g. by another Transform overriding it). Only a single callback function may be registered.

public void OnAbort(Action<T> function)

Parameters

function Action<T>

The callback function.

OnComplete(Action<T>)

Registers a callback function which is triggered once all Transforms in this TransformSequence<T> complete successfully. If all Transforms already completed successfully at the point of this call, then function is triggered immediately. Only a single callback function may be registered.

public void OnComplete(Action<T> function)

Parameters

function Action<T>

The callback function.

Then(double, params Generator[])

Advances the start time of future appended TransformSequence<T>s to the latest end time of all Transforms in this TransformSequence<T> plus delay milliseconds. Then, childGenerators are appended via Append(IEnumerable<Generator>).

public TransformSequence<T> Then(double delay, params TransformSequence<T>.Generator[] childGenerators)

Parameters

delay double

The delay after the latest end time of all Transforms.

childGenerators Generator[]

The optional TransformSequence<T>.Generators for TransformSequence<T>s to be appended.

Returns

TransformSequence<T>

This TransformSequence<T>.

Then(params Generator[])

Advances the start time of future appended TransformSequence<T>s to the latest end time of all Transforms in this TransformSequence<T>. Then, childGenerators are appended via Append(IEnumerable<Generator>).

public TransformSequence<T> Then(params TransformSequence<T>.Generator[] childGenerators)
